lead_paragraph: An ambulance driver working at a hospital supported by Doctors Without Borders was among the casualties.
snippet: An ambulance driver working at a hospital supported by Doctors Without Borders was among the casualties.

headline.main: Yemen: Airstrikes Kill 18, Including a Hospital Worker
headline.print_headline: Middle East; Yemen: Airstrikes Kill 18, Including a Hospital Worker

abstract: Doctors Without Borders reports airstrikes in Dhayan district of northern Yemen kill at least 18 people, including ambulance full of casualties and responding rescuers.
